Tahoe Vista is located in North Lake Tahoe, CA. Just a few minutes to Northstar-at-Tahoe Ski Resort and the beach shores of all North Lake Tahoe. It's just a 15-to-20 minute drive to

, Alpine Meadows, Mount Rose, Paige Meadows and more. Endless acres of forested back-country for hiking, mountain biking, and snowmobiling. The North Shore's finest and most popular restaurants, shops and outdoor destinations are all right here. Reno is about a 30 minute drive over Mt.Rose on a nice day. There are many short term rental homes in the area that make it a wonderful place for year around fun.
Most people either drive to Lake Tahoe from the San Francisco Bay Area or fly into the Reno airport and rent a car.
The Gondola ride at Squaw Valley is truly amazing or the Ice Rink at Northstar. Simply type in Lake Tahoe and endless activities will show.

value: content=An American bistro and wine bar that serves good contemporary American in a more traditional Tahoe-style lodge.

content=Romantic lakefront lodge offering 9 guest rooms with private outdoor entrances, gas log fireplaces, custom-built log furniture, and Scandia Down comforters and featherbeds. Cozy mountain lodge atmosphere with a large outdoor lake front hot tub, perfect to enjoy a gorgeous sunset after a day of skiing or hiking.
